hints.content:
Let's break up or group the values to try to get the same addends in each expression. 

If there are no leftovers, the expressions are equal.

If there are leftovers, they will show us which expression is greater.

$\begin{align}
\blueE{49} + \maroonD{262}&\stackrel?={50} + \maroonD{262} +{1}\\\\
\blueE{49} + \maroonD{262}&\stackrel?=\blueE{49} + {1}+\maroonD{262} +{1}\\\\
\blueE{49} + \maroonD{262}&\stackrel?=\blueE{49}+\maroonD{262} +{1} + {1}\\\\
\blueE{49} + \maroonD{262}&\neq \blueE{49}+\maroonD{262} +{2}
\end{align}$

We added $2$ on the right side of the equation, but not on the left side.

So the left side of the equation is less.
No, the results are not equal because $49 + 262 < 50 + 262 +1$.

question.content:
Nereo wants to solve $49 + 262$.

So he adds $50 + 262 +1$ to solve in his head. 

**Is Nereo's result equal to $49 + 262$?**
